Posts.Content: I would also demand a biopsy right then and there. Dont let them give you the "wait six months" stuff.
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content: oops..that was 7/04, not 7/05....I have been on Imuran for 15 months now.
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump

Posts.Content: Hi Susie..I have seen you posting on the UC board with me as well!  Seems we frequent the same boards..lucky us  :)
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump

Posts.Content: Susie, I am on the bottom of CA in the OC.  Maybe you can give us all some new good news over on the UC board.
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump

Posts.Content: Susie...thats great!  Less worrying...less stomach issues.
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump

Posts.Content:
Susie, I dont even 
life at all during the whole "waiting for results" phase of my life.  It was never far from my mind...even during sleep.
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump

Posts.Content: Hi, I am certainly no expert in this area, but I did have two MRI's on my breasts last summer.  I was going to have a lumpectomy on the right breast, and they ordered an MRI to give additional information.  Well... my MRI found more spots too...but the dr.s assured me that MRI's are extremely sensitive, but HORRIBLE at delineating what they see.  My extra findings ended being normal breast tissue, but that couldnt be confirmed without the follow up breast MRI biopsy.
Posts.Title: Surgery scheduled...but what for?

Posts.Content: Pam, I was told several times I had a "complicated case".  At my mammo, they found something suspicious.  The u/s saw a jagged shape...so they did a biopsy then and there.  Foward past two MRI's and a lumpectomy to a benign "complex sclerosing lesion".  It wasnt cancer, but can turn down the road.
Posts.Title: How long for results?

Posts.Content: I got the same option when they found my "spot" on the U/S.  I could wait 6 mths, or they could biopsy in now.  I was stunned at the differences between the choices...
Posts.Title: Breast Cysts

Posts.Content: Well, I had my consultation with the breast surgeon yesterday.
Posts.Title: I met my surgeon

Posts.Content:
Thank you both for your very thoughtful replies 
     I alternate between rational like you gals are, to being the stressed out maniac I am right now.  I already have ulcerative colitis (as you can see in my sig at the bottom) and have to watch out for colon cancer once a year.
Posts.Title: I met my surgeon

Posts.Content: I am not a happy camper today. I was scheduled to have my lesion taken out this morning.  Turns out my surgeon is volunteering in New Orleans, but nobody called me to cancel my surgery. So I do all the prep....take a day off of work and hubby does too.  Im stressed all freaking holiday weekend, and they even had me wait 30 min in the waiting room AND get a gown on. Im all ready to get the wire guided thingy in place, and someone comes back to say "Didnt they call you?"  Ugggghgghhg
Posts.Title: My surgery catastrophe!!!!!
Advice...Suggestions? I have a Complex Sclerosis Lesion

Posts.Content:
I had my follow up appt today with my breast surgeon, and they gave me the good news that my lesion was benign!!!  When will the news settle in....Im not sure..  I have been so wrapped up in my breast issues, I dont know how to NOT think about
 it.  I am to follow up with the surgeon in a year for a pysical re-eval, and will be doing mammos every 2 years.
Posts.Title: Yeah yeah yeah!

Posts.Content:
*Go get it checked out*!  I started off on my seemingly never ending quest to be over this breast "stuff" by having breast pain. I went to my normal doc, and got a prescript
ion for a DX mammo and ultrasound.  They actually found something totally unrelated, but I truly feel like the breast pain was a sign for me. If I hadnt had it...my first mammo would have been many years down the road, and maybe too late
Posts.Title: I don't know If I'm in the right area but question about breast pain..

Posts.Content: I am DEFINITELY having the lesion removed.  I couldnt just live and "wonder" what might happen.  I keep missing the dr.s phone calls today, but I will try again tomorrow.  My job isnt very conducive to getting phone calls as I am speech pathologist who run all over a large campus.  Figures I leave the room and the phone rings.
Posts.Title: Advice...Suggestions? I have a Complex Sclerosis Lesion

Posts.Content: Its been a bit..so I wanted to post my update.
